extendedInfo.description: The Mental Manual for Tennis Winners app is a collection of tennis tips that help your overcome challenging situations in a match. Learn how to deal with off-court and on-court anxiousness, how to overcome bad line calls, how to play if you're a set behind and even how to approach the match if you're leading. There are 29 mentally challenging situations in total. The Mental Manual concludes with the proper way of analyzing a tennis match and how to best learn from your mistakes.
